AVATAR_OPTION_USER: The user to display an avatar for.
AVATAR_OPTION_FORMAT: Show all format and size variations for the avatar.
AVATAR_NO_AVATAR: <@%1> does not have an avatar and options cannot be provided.
CANCEL_NOT_PLAYING: I am not currently in the middle of a message.
INFO_DETAIL:
Open-source moderation and utility bot for small communities.
Source code available [here](https://go.zptx.icu/Warden), invite [here](%1).
Running version `%2`.
LOCALE_DESCRIPTION: Change Warden's locale in this server.
PREPEND_DESCRIPTION: Configure text-to-speech to prepend a username or nickname.
PREPEND_ENABLED: Text-to-speech will now prepend the user's **%1** in messages.
SAY_DESCRIPTION: Say something in your voice channel through text-to-speech.
SAY_IN_PROGRESS: I am in the middle of another message.
SAY_LOAD_FAIL: There was an error loading your message. Try again later.
